dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Apple Tests Key Technical Level in Worst Start Since 2008
News Content: (Bloomberg) -- Apple Inc.’s stock has had a rough start to the year and is now flirting with a key level that could signal more downside ahead if breached.

Most Read from Bloomberg

What Happened to Hanging Out on the Street? How Sanctuary Cities Are Preparing for Another Showdown With Trump Billionaire Developer Caruso Slams LA Leadership Over Wildfires Texas HOA Charged With Discrimination for Banning Section 8 Renters Hoboken PATH Station Will Close for Almost a Month on Jan. 30

The stock has slumped 11% in 2025 through Thursday’s close, making it by far the worst performer in the Magnificent Seven group. It has also significantly underperformed the S&P 500, which has gained about 4% to touch a fresh record high to start the year. Apple’s performance is the worst start of the year for the iPhone maker since 2008, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.

The decline has brought shares within a few dollars of the 200-day moving average, a technical level that can be seen as a long-term support and is one that many traders watch.

The level is “always a good reference point of trend,” said Todd Sohn, an ETF and technical strategist at Strategas Securities LLC. “When you get names starting to flirt with it or start to break below it, you kind of lose confidence that the uptrend of that name is still intact.”

It’s a precarious position for Apple shares. The company was, until recently, the largest company by market value in the world, and commanded the largest weighting in the S&P 500 Index. Nvidia has since eclipsed it during Apple’s tumble.

While one single stock doesn’t always move the rest of the index, Apple’s size and position make it one to watch. So far, the S&P 500 has continued to rally, even with Apple’s selloff, but if any of the other big technology stocks similarly start to tick lower, it could be a concerning sign for the bull market that’s now entering its third year.

“The market has been pretty resilient in light of the fact that Apple has been under pressure,” Katie Stockton, managing partner and founder of Fairlead Strategies LLC, said. Still, “it definitely has the potential to create some more risk for those major indices. If we see that downside follow-through that we’re anticipating, that makes it more challenging, of course, for those indices to shrug it off.”

Stockton sees further declines for Apple stock, she said. If shares do fall below the 200-day moving average, the next level she’s watching is around $208, based on a technical analysis called Ichimoku.

That level “is a more likely point for the correction to mature,” Stockton said. “We obviously don’t have a crystal ball, but based on where they currently stand, it looks like we’ll see the 200-day moving average taken out and progress toward that secondary support.”

Story Continues

Apple is scheduled to report quarterly earnings Jan. 30 after markets close, a major catalyst for shares that investors will be closely watching. Wall Street expects the iPhone maker to report earnings per share of $2.35 on $124.2 billion in revenue.

Of course, Apple shares could just test the 200-day moving average level and rebound higher, especially if it reports earnings that beat analyst expectations. While the 200-day is a key psychological level that can be a warning sign for stocks, some traders may also use it as an indicator to start buying shares at a discount.

“You could have buyers who maybe set the 200-day level as a spot to add more exposure,” said Sohn. “So then the question becomes; if you hold here, can Apple rally back to $260?”

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.

Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: Apple Inc. (AAPL) is set to report its earnings next week, which typically generates significant investor interest and can lead to volatility in the stock price. The overall market sentiment appears cautious due to mixed signals from other tech companies and external factors such as Trump's policy agenda. Given the historical performance of AAPL around earnings reports, there is a reasonable chance of a price rise if the results exceed expectations, but the uncertainty surrounding the broader market and potential negative sentiment could also lead to a price decline. Therefore, the probabilities are estimated to reflect a balanced outlook with a slight inclination towards a rise.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. The immediate term (Q1 earnings) is expected to be positive, which typically drives the stock price up. However, the medium-term (March quarter and FY25/26) outlook is less optimistic due to projected iPhone sales decline and slower adoption of Apple Intelligence. BofA's continued bullish stance, citing strong cash flow and potential product launches, provides some counterweight to the negative forecasts. The price target adjustment, while slightly downward, still suggests upside potential. Considering these factors, the positive Q1 earnings are likely to have a stronger immediate impact than the longer-term concerns, but the negative forecasts will likely temper the rise. The price target adjustment also suggests a limited upside. Therefore, the probability of a rise is slightly higher than a fall, but not overwhelmingly so.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. While the projected revenue and EPS growth are positive, concerns exist regarding slowing iPhone sales, regulatory pressures on services, and the uncertain success of the Vision Pro headset.  The 14% drop from the 2024 high indicates a bearish sentiment already present in the market.  The earnings call's commentary on these key areas (iPhone sales, services growth, Vision Pro, and buybacks) will heavily influence investor reaction.  Given the mixed signals and existing bearish sentiment, the probability of a price rise is lower than a price fall, although a significant fall is not guaranteed. The macro environment also adds uncertainty.

The stock is nearing its 200-day moving average, a key technical support level. Breaching this level could signal further downside, as noted by technical analysts. The upcoming earnings report on January 30 is a critical catalyst, but current sentiment leans negative due to the stock's recent performance and technical indicators. While there's potential for a rebound if earnings surprise positively, the immediate technical outlook suggests higher risk of continued decline.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news about Apple Inc. (AAPL) hiring Kim Vorrath to boost its AI capabilities and improve Siri is generally positive. Vorrath's extensive experience in software development, including her role in managing the original iPhone software and overseeing operating systems, is likely to enhance Apple's AI offerings. This move can help Apple catch up with its rivals in the AI space, such as OpenAI, Amazon, Google, and Microsoft. While the company has faced some AI-related setbacks, the addition of a seasoned professional like Vorrath can be seen as a strategic step to strengthen its position. Therefore, the probability of the stock price rising is higher than falling.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news article discusses Apple's upcoming Q1 2025 earnings report, where the company is expected to post a 3% year-over-year increase in revenue and a rise in EPS. However, there are concerns about plateauing consumer demand for iPhones and slower growth in the services segment due to regulatory pressures. The article also mentions that investors will be looking for commentary on the Vision Pro headset and the company's product roadmap. Considering these factors, the stock price movement will likely depend on how the actual earnings report compares to the expected revenue and EPS. Given the mixed signals, with both positive and negative expectations, I estimate that the probability of the stock price rising is slightly lower than the probability of it falling, as the concerns about iPhone sales and regulatory pressures may outweigh the expected increase in revenue and EPS.

The overall market positivity, combined with the mention of strong performance of both equities and tech stocks, suggests a likely positive sentiment towards Apple's stock. However, it is important to note that specific company performance can be influenced by a multitude of factors beyond general market trends.
